welcomeSubtitle: The digital assistant for your private aviation company. Manage flights and bookings with unprecedented ease.
feature1Text: Our system allows you to search and filter private flights in real-time, connecting you with a global network of operators.
feature2Text: Access exclusive opportunities for flights at reduced prices, taking advantage of the empty legs of private jets.
feature3Text: Keep a detailed record of all your past trips, with easy access to information and management of your flights.
techText: Aera is built on a foundation of cutting-edge web technologies to ensure a fast, secure, and scalable user experience.
ctaSubtitle: Explore the application and discover the new era of private travel.

dashboard.title: Control Panel
dashboard.desc: Publish flights, manage fleet, and get real-time statistics and analysis of your company.

clientPlatform.title: Client Platform
clientPlatform.desc: Request flights, view Empty Legs, and make payments. Professional and exclusive design made for your company.

emailMarketing.title: Email Marketing for Empty Legs
emailMarketing.desc: Send personalized communications about Empty Legs flights, optimizing dissemination and commercial reach.

budgetAutomation.title: Budget Automation
budgetAutomation.desc: Generate flight quotes automatically, applying company parameters to ensure speed, precision, and efficiency in every quote.

clientValidation.title: Client Registration Validation
clientValidation.desc: Validate client registrations via SMS, email, or WhatsApp, ensuring authenticity and reliability of entered information.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Translation
multilingual.desc: Offer your services in different languages, facilitating reach to international markets.

scalable.title: Scalable and Modular
scalable.desc: Possibility of future functional expansions and design customization.

hero.passengerPlatform: Aera is a Web Platform for Passengers.
hero.adminPanel: Aera is a Control Panel for Administrators.

poweredBy.desc: Aera is our management platform where we embody our experience and creativity.
